title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos in Gotham.

title: Tenet
description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, a protagonist fights for the survival of the world.

title: Dune
description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control of a desert planet.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully and Ney'tiri form a family and fight to stay together.

title: Oppenheimer
description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the father of the atomic bomb.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the world is a simulation controlled by machines.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Spider-Man seeks help from Doctor Strange when his identity is revealed.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: The Guardians band together for one last mission to protect Rocket.
